item.title: BMW E39: Corner Sunshade Replacement
item.description: This article will detail the removal and re-installation of the corner sunshade on the rear doors of the E39 5-series. Objective: This article will detail the removal and re-installation of the corner sunshade on the rear doors of the E39 5-series. Applicable Vehicles: 1996-2003 BMW E39 5-series: 520i, 523i, 525i, 528i, 530i, 535i, 540i, M5. Parts required: Left Corner Sunshade: 51167110205 Right Corner Sunshade: 51167110206 Difficulty: Low Time Required: Less than 10 minutes
